title: How to Make Pap in the Microwave

steps.title: Measure out a cup of maize flour into the microwave bowl (1 cup should make enough for 3-4 people).
steps.content: Measure out a cup of maize flour into the microwave bowl (1 cup should make enough for 3-4 people).

steps.title: Add a pinch of salt, more than a pinch or none at all to suit your tastes.
steps.content: Add a pinch of salt, more than a pinch or none at all to suit your tastes.

steps.title: Add just enough of the freshly boiled water to wet all the flour and work it in with the fork.
steps.content: Add just enough of the freshly boiled water to wet all the flour and work it in with the fork.

steps.title: Set microwave on "High" and the timer for 10 minutes.
steps.content: Set microwave on "High" and the timer for 10 minutes. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Put the lid on your bowl and pop it in the microwave.
steps.content: Put the lid on your bowl and pop it in the microwave.

steps.title: Microwave for about a minute and then remove again.
steps.content: Microwave for about a minute and then remove again.

steps.title: Stir thoroughly with a little bit more water and return to the microwave.
steps.content: Stir thoroughly with a little bit more water and return to the microwave.

steps.title: Repeat this process (Remove, add a little water and stir, microwave again) 3 or 4 more times during cooking time at regular intervals - find a rhythm that works for you!
